de.griefed.serverpackcreator

Class CreateServerPack

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.CreateServerPack

    26.cleanUpServerPack(File, File, String, String, String, String)

    Requires an instance of Configuration from which to get all required information about the modpack and the then to be generated server pack.

    Requires an instance of LocalizationManager for use of localization, but creates one if injected one is null.

    Create a server pack from a modpack by copying all specified or required files from the modpack to the server pack as well as installing the modloader server for the specified modloader, modloader version and Minecraft version. Create a ZIP-archive of the server pack, excluding the Minecraft server JAR, for immediate upload to CurseForge or other platforms.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreateServerPack

        public CreateServerPack(LocalizationManager injectedLocalizationManager,
                        Configuration injectedConfiguration,
                        CurseCreateModpack injectedCurseCreateModpack)
        Constructor

        Used for Dependency Injection.

        Receives an instance of LocalizationManager or creates one if the received one is null. Required for use of localization.

        Receives an instance of Configuration required to successfully and correctly create the server pack.

        Receives an instance of CurseCreateModpack in case the modpack has to be created from a combination of CurseForge projectID and fileID, from which to then create the server pack.

        Parameters:
        injectedLocalizationManager - Instance of LocalizationManager required for localized log messages.
        injectedConfiguration - Instance of Configuration required to successfully and correctly create the server pack.
        injectedCurseCreateModpack - Instance of CurseCreateModpack in case the modpack has to be created from a combination of CurseForge projectID and fileID, from which to then create the server pack.

      • run

        public boolean run()
        Create a server pack if the check of the configuration file was successfull.

        Calls

        cleanupEnvironment(String) to delete any previously generated server packs or ZIP-archives thereof.

        copyFiles(String, List, List) to copy all specified directories and mods, excluding clientside-only mods, to the server pack.

        copyStartScripts(String, String, boolean) to copy the start scripts for the specified modloader to the server pack.

        installServer(String, String, String, String, String) to install the server software for the specified modloader, modloader version and Minecraft version in the server pack.

        copyIcon(String) to copy the server-icon.png to the server pack.

        copyProperties(String) to copy the server.properties to the server pack.

        zipBuilder(String, String, Boolean, String) to create a ZIP-archive of the server pack and delete the Minecraft server JAR from it.

        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the server pack was successfully generated.

      • cleanupEnvironment

        void cleanupEnvironment(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Deletes all files, directories and ZIP-archives of previously generated server packs to ensure newly generated server pack is as clean as possible.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The server_pack directory and ZIP-archive will be deleted inside the modpack directory.

      • copyStartScripts

        void copyStartScripts(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                      java.lang.String modLoader,
                      boolean includeStartScripts)
        Copies start scripts for the specified modloader into the server pack.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. Start scripts are copied into the server_pack directory in the modpack directory.
        modLoader - String. Whether to copy the Forge or Fabric scripts into the server pack.
        includeStartScripts - Boolean. Whether to copy the start scripts into the server pack.

      • copyFiles

        void copyFiles(java.lang.String modpackDir,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> copyDirs,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientMods)
        Copies all specified directories and mods, excluding clientside-only mods, from the modpack directory into the server pack directory. Calls excludeClientMods(String, List) to generate a list of all mods to copy to server pack, excluding clientside-only mods.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. Files and directories are copied into the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.
        copyDirs - String List. All directories and files therein to copy to the server pack.
        clientMods - String List. List of clientside-only mods to exclude from the server pack.

      • excludeClientMods

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> excludeClientMods(java.lang.String modsDir,
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientMods)
        Generates a list of all mods to include in the server pack excluding clientside-only mods.
        Parameters:
        modsDir - String. The mods directory of the modpack of which to generate a list of all it's contents.
        clientMods - List String. A list of all clientside-only mods.
        Returns:
        List String. A list of all mods to include in the server pack.

      • copyIcon

        void copyIcon(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Copies the server-icon.png into server_pack.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The server-icon.png is copied into the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.

      • copyProperties

        void copyProperties(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Copies the server.properties into server_pack.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The server.properties file is copied into the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.

      • installServer

        void installServer(java.lang.String modLoader,
                   java.lang.String modpackDir,
                   java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                   java.lang.String modLoaderVersion,
                   java.lang.String javaPath)
        Installs the modloader server for the specified modloader, modloader version and Minecraft version. Calls

        downloadFabricJar(String) to download the Fabric installer into the server_pack directory.

        downloadForgeJar(String, String, String) to download the Forge installer for the specified Forge version and Minecraft version.

        generateDownloadScripts(String, String, String) to generate the download scripts of the Minecraft server JAR for the specified Minecraft version and file-name depending on whether the modloader is Forge or Fabric.

        cleanUpServerPack(File, File, String, String, String, String) to delete no longer needed files generated by the installation process of the modloader server software.

        Parameters:
        modLoader - String. The modloader for which to install the server software. Either Forge or Fabric.
        modpackDir - String. The server software is installed into the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version for which to install the modloader and Minecraft server.
        modLoaderVersion - String. The modloader version for which to install the modloader and Minecraft server.
        javaPath - String. The path to the Java executable/binary which is needed to execute the Forge/Fabric installers.

      • zipBuilder

        void zipBuilder(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                java.lang.String modLoader,
                java.lang.Boolean includeServerInstallation,
                java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Creates a ZIP-archive of the server_pack directory and deletes the Minecraft server JAR afterwards.

        With help from Stackoverflow

        Calls

        deleteMinecraftJar(String, String, String) to delete the Minecraft server JAR from the ZIP-archive, depending on which modloader and Minecraft version is specified.

        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The directory server_pack will be zipped and placed inside the modpack directory.
        modLoader - String. Determines the name of the Minecraft server JAR to delete from the ZIP-archive.
        includeServerInstallation - Boolean. Determines whether the Minecraft server JAR needs to be deleted from the ZIP-archive.
        minecraftVersion - String. Determines the name of the Minecraft server JAR to delete from the ZIP-archive if the modloader is Forge.

      • generateDownloadScripts

        void generateDownloadScripts(java.lang.String modLoader,
                             java.lang.String modpackDir,
                             java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Depending on the specified modloader and Minecraft version, this method makes calls to generate the corresponding download scripts for the Minecraft server JAR.

        Calls

        fabricShell(String, String) if the modloader is Fabric. fabricBatch(String, String) if the modloader is Fabric. forgeShell(String, String) if the modloader is Forge. forgeBatch(String, String) if the modloader is Forge.

        Parameters:
        modLoader - String. Determines whether the scripts are generated for Forge or Fabric.
        modpackDir - String. The scripts are generated in the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.
        minecraftVersion - String. Determines the Minecraft version for which the scripts are generated.

      • fabricShell

        void fabricShell(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                 java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Generates Fabric Linux-shell download scripts for Mojang's Minecraft server JAR for the specified Minecraft version.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The script is generated in the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version for which to download the server JAR.

      • fabricBatch

        void fabricBatch(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                 java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Generates Fabric Windows-Batch download scripts for Mojang's Minecraft server JAR for the specified Minecraft version.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The script is generated in the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version for which to download the server JAR.

      • forgeShell

        void forgeShell(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Generates Forge Linux-shell download scripts for Mojang's Minecraft server JAR for the specified Minecraft version.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The script is generated in the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version for which to download the server JAR.

      • forgeBatch

        void forgeBatch(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Generates Forge Windows-Batch download scripts for Mojang's Minecraft server JAR for the specified Minecraft version.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The script is generated in the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version for which to download the server JAR.

      • downloadFabricJar

        boolean downloadFabricJar(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Downloads the latest Fabric installer into the server pack.

        Calls

        latestFabricInstaller(String) to acquire the latest version of the Fabric installer.

        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The Fabric installer is downloaded into the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the download was successfull.

      • latestFabricInstaller

        java.lang.String latestFabricInstaller(java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Acquires the latest version of the Fabric modloader installer and returns it as a string. If acquisition of the latest version fails, version 0.7.2 is returned by default.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The fabric-installer.xml-file is saved inside the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.
        Returns:
        String. Returns the version of the latest Fabric modloader installer.

      • downloadForgeJar

        boolean downloadForgeJar(java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                         java.lang.String modLoaderVersion,
                         java.lang.String modpackDir)
        Downloads the modloader server installer for Forge, for the specified modloader version.
        Parameters:
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version for which to download the modloader server installer.
        modLoaderVersion - String. The Forge version for which to download the modloader server installer.
        modpackDir - String. The modloader installer is downloaded to the server_pack directory inside the modloader directory.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the download was successful.

      • deleteMinecraftJar

        void deleteMinecraftJar(java.lang.String modLoader,
                        java.lang.String modpackDir,
                        java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Deletes the Minecraft server JAR from the ZIP-archive as per Mojang's TOS and EULA. With help from Stackoverflow and OpenJDK Bugtracker.
        Parameters:
        modLoader - String. The name of the Minecraft server JAR depends on the modloader used.
        modpackDir - String. The directory in which the ZIP-archive is stored.
        minecraftVersion - String. The name of the Minecraft server JAR depends on the Minecraft version if the modloader is Forge.

      • cleanUpServerPack

        void cleanUpServerPack(java.io.File fabricInstaller,
                       java.io.File forgeInstaller,
                       java.lang.String modLoader,
                       java.lang.String modpackDir,
                       java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                       java.lang.String modLoaderVersion)
        Cleans up the server_pack directory by deleting left-over files from modloader installations and version checking.
        Parameters:
        fabricInstaller - File. The Fabric installer file which is to be deleted.
        forgeInstaller - File. The Forge installer file which is to be deleted.
        modLoader - String. Whether Forge or Fabric files are to be deleted.
        modpackDir - String. Cleanup tasks are done inside the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.
        minecraftVersion - String. Needed for renaming the Forge server JAR to work with launch scripts provided by ServerPackCreator.
        modLoaderVersion - String. Needed for renaming the Forge server JAR to work with launch scripts provided by ServerPackCreator.
